attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app, it directed me to an audio message that said â€œ Whether you're up in the clouds or going way underground, it's easy to take your music with you whereever you go. With Spotify Premium, you can save your favorite songs to your phone and listen offline. That means you can play anywhere, anytime without using any data. And right now, you can try Premium free for 30 days. Ready to make the move? Tap the banner to learn more. As soon as it concluded, it spammed my phone with many viruses. Absolutely horrible.

attributes.review: First of all This App took 1 Week,2 days,4 Hours,52 minutes,and 14 Seconds To download and after all the waiting time I thought that the app was going to be amazing...When I opened the app I was greeted by A Cursed Image of Joe Biden Shoving a Crispy Chicken wing up his Vagina with a big caption that says Vote Trump 2020. Soon as I seen the Horrifying image I Deleted the app and that night I went to bed and in the morning I woke up to a note On my kitchen table that says Donald Trump Took my jar of sacred black pickles and sayed I had to pay 1 Trillion Dollars to ever see then again.He showed up at my doorstep and I Gave him the 1 Trillion Dollars and he gave me my sacred black pickles back.Soon As he gave me my Pickles back he proceded to storm in my house and slide his balls back and fourth accross the meat grinder while screaming racial slurs at the top of his lungs.... DONT INSTALL THE APP...
attributes.title: God Awful App(Should Be Removed)
